channel.title: Your top five favorite mods
channel.description:
Post your favorite mods for half-life, half-life 2, and any other source game. (it has to be released).
1. Zombie mod: Source [url='https://www.moddb.com/mods/zombiemod-source']Moddb page[/url] 2. Zombie Panic: Source [url='https://www.moddb.com/mods/zombie-panic-source']Moddb page[/url] 3. Dear Esther [url='https://www.moddb.com/mods/dear-esther']Moddb page[/url] 4. Fortress Forever [url='https://www.moddb.com/mods/fortress-forever']Moddb page[/url] 5. G-mod 9 [url='https://www.moddb.com/mods/garrys-mod']Moddb page[/url]
Also post you favorite unreleased mods 1. Black Mesa [url='https://www.moddb.com/mods/black-mesa']Moddb page[/url] 2. Curse [url='https://www.moddb.com/mods/curse1']Moddb page[/url] 3. Operation Black Mesa [url='https://www.moddb.com/mods/operation-black-mesa']Moddb page[/url] 4. Opposing Force 2 [url='https://www.moddb.com/mods/opposing-force-2']Moddb page[/url] 5. The Mortewood Plaza [url='https://www.moddb.com/mods/the-mortewood-plaza']Moddb Page[/url]
Post you favorite mods!

item.title: Your top five favorite mods
item.dc:creator: Dust
item.description:
JeffMOD:

Yet everyone hates Blue Shift.
I don’t know why, besides wasted potential. I mean, the basic story was great, and the diologe seemed realistic for the premise, but it was short, and there was so much they could have done with it.
If anyone ever makes a good remake of Blue Shift, they have to add to the story, and levels, but not to the enemies and weapons.

It was simply because there were no new weapons or enemies…

I actually enjoyed it a little more than Opposing Force.

Read full topic

item.title: Your top five favorite mods
item.dc:creator: JeffMOD
item.description:
Dust:

ETC 2.

Very impressive level design and a fantastic atmosphere.

Felt very much like Blue Shift.

Yet everyone hates Blue Shift.
I don’t know why, besides wasted potential. I mean, the basic story was great, and the diologe seemed realistic for the premise, but it was short, and there was so much they could have done with it.
If anyone ever makes a good remake of Blue Shift, they have to add to the story, and levels, but not to the enemies and weapons.

Read full topic

item.title: Your top five favorite mods
item.dc:creator: Master_Chef
item.description:
^This

The plot was going somewhere, but then its like, “Here’s a ton of guns that you shouldn’t really use, because the Americans will just mow you down if you aren’t using the BFG machine gun. Oh, we also made some mini-bosses for you, which probably took several months to create, but we made it so you can hop on top of a crate and blast them away while they get stuck on the wall. Hope you had fun!!!”

Seriously, that mod had extreme potential. I think that they spent too much time making a stunning boot camp, and not enough time on the actual combat.

Read full topic

item.description:
Yeah it was just getting good when you kill the 4 “dudes”

and then it’s like no wait, it’s over. gfto.

item.title: Your top five favorite mods
item.dc:creator: Master_Chef
item.description:
I just finished playing Paranoia today. As great as the game was, I was disappointed at the length of the game. It was so short that several enemies only appeared once, and I didn’t even get a chance to use some of the weapons. Still, it’s worth a download.

Read full topic

item.title: Your top five favorite mods
item.dc:creator: John_Killer118
item.description:
KernCore:

Oh man… thanks for showing this to me… downloading
19% - 39 Minutes

so long as it loads, i’m watching this

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RWte6-usOKo&feature=channel_page

WAAASSUUUUUUP!!!
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=g66ll9hoTHY&feature=related

Anyway, I can now add NeoTokyo to my list. Four down, now I just need one more awesome mod and I can now have a complete list of my favorite HL2 mods. I’m taking bets on what that next mod will be!

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: matacoz
item.description:
Mine would have to be (in no certain order)

-Sven Coop

-Golden eye Source

-Synergy

-Insurgency

-If you count it, CS/TFC…

This thread is a cool idea though, opened a lot of new mods for me! =D

item.title: Your top five favorite mods
item.dc:creator: Imonfire
item.description:
Master Chef:

It’s the most polished goldsrc mod I’ve played so far, and I’ve played some good ones.

Just make sure you’re ready to read a lot of subtitles.

item.title: Your top five favorite mods
item.dc:creator: Eric_Fong
item.description:
Released:
1.Zombie Master https://www.moddb.com/mods/zombie-master
2.Ravenholm https://www.moddb.com/mods/ravenholm
3.Eye of the Storm(sequel of Ravenholm) https://www.moddb.com/mods/eye-of-the-storm
4.Zombie Panic! Source(which you can download in steam)
5.(not having it yet)

Working mod:
1.Black Mesa(AKA BMS) https://www.moddb.com/mods/black-mesa
2.Opposing Force 2 https://www.moddb.com/mods/opposing-force-2
3.Outbreak: Condemned https://www.moddb.com/mods/outbreak-series
4.Morning Faith(I am beta tested. ) https://www.moddb.com/mods/morning-faith
5.Mortewood Plaza https://www.moddb.com/mods/the-mortewood-plaza

item.title: Your top five favorite mods
item.dc:creator: Deathmonkey7
item.description:
Master Chef:

I downloaded Paranoia, but when I try to play it, it tells me that Windows can’t find ‘hl.exe’ and that I should make sure I typed the right message. Is it possible that the Steam version of HL is incompatible with the mod?

Here’s the link:
https://www.moddb.com/mods/paranoia

No, actually I downloaded it and have been playing it on my steam version of Half-Life.

Be sure it installed correctly, with the “Paranoia” folder being in “\SteamApps<steam user>\Half-Life”

It’s a really good mod so far! I’ve encountered a crash though in an elevator soon after you first run into the zombies. Crashes every time soon after the level starts up.

Read full topic

item.title: Your top five favorite mods
item.dc:creator: _rot_fodder
item.description:
At the moment I am addicted to Smod tactical, but not with the defaults. I’ve got to console command the thing to hell before I play. I put on crosshairs and set the health regen rate up, tweak a bunch of other small things and then play it like smod redux bscly.

what Is fun is to set bullettimesim timescale to 1 and then play with all of the bullet time percs

Read full topic

item.title: Your top five favorite mods
item.dc:creator: Master_Chef
item.description:
My bad, I meant heart of EVIL.

EDIT: dl’d it, can only say WTF to coneheads, apes, and direct rip-offs of Apocolypse Now. Great mod though.

Read full topic

item.title: Your top five favorite mods
item.dc:creator: Firebringer
item.description:
Master Chef:

I’m thinking of downloading Heart of Darkness: Napalm Edition. If anyone has played the original, would you recommend it?

Yes, I recommended playing the original, even though the models look bad, it’s still fun and longer than Napalm Edition. Also, it works best with the WON version of half-life (It has fog in some places and some MP3s that can only be played in the WON version), and It’s called Heart of Evil, not Heart of Darkness.

Read full topic
